text: 3|39|Atahpara yakhana yakariyya ibadata kakse salate damriyechilena takhana pheres‌tara take ahabana kare balala, ‘niscaya allah‌ apanake iyah‌iyara susambada dicchena, se habe allah‌ra paksa theke agamanakrta eka kalemake satyayanakari [1], neta [2], bhoga asaktimukta [3] ebam punyabanadera antarbhukta ekajana nabi.’
